getProperties().Description: Returns the properties of this characteristic. The properties contain a bit mask of property flags indicating the features of this characteristic.

Returns: true if the locally stored value has been set, false if the requested value could not be stored locally.
Parameters: byte: New value for this characteristic
setValue(byte[]).Description: Updates the locally stored value of this characteristic. This function modifies the locally stored cached value of this characteristic. To send the value to the remote device, call @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#writeCharacteristic_E@ to send the value to the remote device.

Returns: true if the locally stored value has been set
Parameters: String: New value for this characteristic

Returns: Cached value of the characteristic or null of offset exceeds value size.
Parameters: int: The format type used to interpret the characteristic value.
int: Offset at which the integer value can be found.
getIntValue(int,int).Description: Return the stored value of this characteristic. The formatType parameter determines how the characteristic value is to be interpreted. For example, settting formatType to @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGattCharacteristic#FORMAT_UINT16_E@ specifies that the first two bytes of the characteristic value at the given offset are interpreted to generate the return value.
getIntValue(int,int).FullName: public Integer getIntValue (int formatType, int offset)

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

getValue().Description: Get the stored value for this characteristic. This function returns the stored value for this characteristic as retrieved by calling @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGatt#readCharacteristic_E@. The cached value of the characteristic is updated as a result of a read characteristic operation or if a characteristic update notification has been received.

getDescriptors().Description: Returns a list of descriptors for this characteristic.

Parameters: UUID: The UUID for this characteristic

ClassDesc: Represents a Bluetooth GATT Characteristic A GATT characteristic is a basic data element used to construct a GATT service, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGattService_E@. The characteristic contains a value as well as additional information and optional GATT descriptors, @B_android#bluetooth#BluetoothGattDescriptor_E@.
